name: Realmwalker
description:
In Realmwalker, you play as a thief named Mel, who is infamous for sneaking into  underground facilities and stealing heavily guarded artifacts. This time around, Mel is trying to escape  with the Realmwalker gauntlet, an experimental piece of technology that allows the user to jump at will  between this world and another. Of course, this is Mel’s most difficult heist yet as she not only has to avoid obstacles from the real world but also the altered version of reality. 

Use the Realmwalker gauntlet to your advantage as you go over, around, and through the dangers that  lie ahead. Not only will laser walls and electric floors block your path, but enemies from both dimensions  will try to stop you. It is your goal to master the timing of your new realm-swapping abilities to evade  these obstacles and escape the facility. 

Instant Noodle Studios

Davis Canby – Designer and Producer 

Devin Schwehr – Programmer and Level Designer 

Cory Theel – Programmer and Sound Designer 

Morgan Lander – 3D Modeler, Concept Artist, and Texture Artist 

Trevor Malpede – 3D Modeler, Rigger, and Animator 

Paul Ruppar – Concept Artist, UI Designer and Texture Artist
